mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, PRF_ID, PRF_KND_CD, PRF_NM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DB_SCH_ID, DBC_TBL_NM, OBJ_NM, ADT_CND_SQL, HNT_SQL, USE_YN, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ERR_CNT_SQL, DQI_ID, DQI_LNM
mapper.insert:
insert into WAQ_PRF_MSTR
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, PRF_KND_CD, DB_CONN_TRG_PNM, DB_SCH_PNM, DBC_TBL_NM, OBJ_NM, PRF_NM,
PRF_ID,
DB_CONN_TRG_ID,
DB_SCH_ID,
ADT_CND_SQL,
HNT_SQL,
USE_YN,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
ERR_CNT_SQL,
DQI_LNM,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
(SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}) , TRIM(UPPER(#{prfKndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), #{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prfNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adtCndSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hntSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errCntSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_PRF_MSTR
PRF_KND_CD = TRIM(UPPER(#{prfKndCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})), DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = #{dbConnTrgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_SCH_PNM =#{dbSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBC_TBL_NM = #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_NM = #{objNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRF_NM = #{prfNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
PRF_ID = #{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADT_CND_SQL = #{adtCndSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HNT_SQL = #{hntSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_CNT_SQL = #{errCntSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DQI_LNM = #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_PRF_MSTR A set (REG_TYP_CD , OBJ_VERS , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID, PRF_ID ) =(select case when A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' else case when MAX(B.PRF_ID) IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end ,case when max(B.OBJ_VERS) is null then 1 else max(B.OBJ_VERS) + 1 end as OBJ_VERS , COALESCE(MAX(B.FRS_RQST_DTM), A.RQST_DTM) as FRS_RQST_DTM , COALESCE(MAX(B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID), A.RQST_USER_ID) as FRS_RQST_USER_ID , COALESCE(MAX(B.PRF_ID) ,A.PRF_ID) as PRF_ID from WAM_PRF_MSTR B where B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and B.PRF_KND_CD = A.PRF_KND_CD and B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID and B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID and B.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM and B.OBJ_NM = A.OBJ_NM ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ${tblNm} A set (REG_TYP_CD , OBJ_VERS , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID, PRF_ID ) =(select B.REG_TYP_CD , B.OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, B.PRF_ID from WAQ_PRF_MSTR B where B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO and B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO
) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update ${tblNm} A set VRF_CD = '4' --검증전 ,RVW_STS_CD = '0' --검토전 where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR D WHERE A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = D.DBC_TBL_NM AND A.OBJ_NM = D.OBJ_NM AND A.PRF_KND_CD = D.PRF_KND_CD AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO )
mapper.update: update WAQ_PRF_MSTR M set DB_CONN_TRG_ID = (SELECT D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D WHERE D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND M.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM ) where M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_PRF_MSTR M set DB_SCH_ID = (SELECT S.DB_SCH_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('99991231','YYYYMMDD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND M.DB_SCH_PNM = S.DB_SCH_PNM ) where M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAT_DBC_TBL D WHERE A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = D.DBC_TBL_NM -- AND COALESCE(D.REG_TYP, 'C') IN ('C','U') )

--검증쿼리 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAT_DBC_TBL D INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_COL C ON D.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID AND D.DBC_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM -- AND COALESCE(C.REG_TYP, 'C') IN ('C','U') WHERE A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = C.DBC_TBL_NM AND A.OBJ_NM = C.DBC_COL_NM -- AND COALESCE(D.REG_TYP, 'C') IN ('C','U') )

--검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR D WHERE A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DB_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND A.PRF_KND_CD = D.PRF_KND_CD AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = D.DBC_TBL_NM AND A.OBJ_NM = D.OBJ_NM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_PRF_MSTR
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND COALESCE(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tblnm} A SET PRF_ID = (SELECT M.PRF_ID FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M WHERE M.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_PRF_MSTR A SET (STWD_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.STWD_ID AS STWD_ID , COALESCE(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR B WHERE B.STWD_LNM = A.STWD_LNM AND B.STWD_PNM = A.STWD_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete:
--WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_PRF_MSTR SELECT
FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR A
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_PRF_MSTR A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_PRF_MSTR (
,EXP_DTM ,STR_DTM ) SELECT
, TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR A
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT B.RQST_NO, B.PRF_NM, MAX(B.RQST_SNO) RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.VRF_CD = '1' GROUP BY B.RQST_NO, B.PRF_NM ) B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.PRF_NM = B.PRF_NM AND A.RQST_SNO <> B.RQST_SNO ) AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

DELETE FROM ${tblnm} A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT M.RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M WHERE M.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND M.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tblnm} A SET RQST_SNO = (SELECT MAX(M.RQST_SNO) FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND M.PRF_NM = A.PRF_NM) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

UPDATE ${Utblnm} M SET REG_TYP_CD = 'U' WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.VRF_CD = '1' AND M.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND M.PRF_ID IN (SELECT A.PRF_ID FROM (SELECT M.PRF_ID ,COUNT(M.PRF_ID) AS M_CNT ,MAX(Q.Q_CNT) AS Q_CNT FROM ${Mtblnm} M INNER JOIN (SELECT PRF_ID, COUNT(PRF_ID) AS Q_CNT FROM ${Qtblnm} WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND REG_TYP_CD = 'D' GROUP BY PRF_ID ) Q ON M.PRF_ID = Q.PRF_ID GROUP BY M.PRF_ID ) A WHERE A.M_CNT <> A.Q_CNT )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAQ_PRF_MSTR ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , PRF_ID , PRF_KND_CD , PRF_NM , DB_CONN_TRG_ID , DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , DB_SCH_ID , DB_SCH_PNM , DBC_TBL_NM , OBJ_NM , ADT_CND_SQL , HNT_SQL , USE_YN , RQST_DCD , RVW_STS_CD , RVW_CONTS , VRF_CD , VRF_RMK , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID , ERR_CNT_SQL , PRFC_SCRIPT) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , RQST_SNO , PRF_ID , PRF_KND_CD , PRF_NM , DB_CONN_TRG_ID , DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , DB_SCH_ID , DB_SCH_PNM , DBC_TBL_NM , OBJ_NM , ADT_CND_SQL , HNT_SQL , USE_YN , RQST_DCD , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , NULL , NULL , ERR_CNT_SQL , PRFC_SCRIPT FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR WHERE RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: update WAQ_PRF_MSTR A set DQI_ID = (select B.DQI_ID from WAM_DQI B where 1=1 and B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') and upper(replace(replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.DQI_LNM)),chr(10),''),chr(13),'')) = upper(replace(replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(B.FULL_PATH)),chr(10),''),chr(13),'')) ) where A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT DISTINCT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,COALESCE(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} --검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.DQI_ID IS NULL

INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT DISTINCT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,COALESCE(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno, jdbcType=INTEGER} --검증쿼리 and A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' and A.DQI_ID IS NOT NULL and 1 != (SELECT COUNT(D.DQI_LVL) FROM ( select MAX(DQI_LVL) AS DQI_LVL FROM WAM_DQI WHERE FULL_PATH LIKE '%' || #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' UNION select DQI_LVL AS DQI_LVL FROM WAM_DQI WHERE FULL_PATH = #{dqiLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) D )
